mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.*, b.CONNAME, c.EMPNAME FROM PURCHASETAB a, CONNECTION b, EMPLOYEE c WHERE a.CONCODE=b.CONCODE(+) AND a.EMPNO=c.EMPNO(+) ORDER BY PURCODE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchaseTab VALUES (seq_purchase.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, (SELECT CONCODE FROM CONNECTION WHERE CONNAME=#{conName} AND CONCATEG='매입'), #{chargeNo}, #{purTotAmt}, default, null, default, null)
